explains: n. 免除，豁免；免税，免税额
wordGroup: exemption clause 免责条款，免究条款
personal income tax exemption 个人所得税免除

sentences.en: Seventeen states allow parents to get an exemption, sometimes just by signing a paper saying they personally object to a vaccine.
sentences.cn: 17个州允许父母获得豁免，有时他们只需要签署一份文件，以此声明他们反对接种疫苗。

sentences.en: She was given exemption from the final examination.
A senior certificate with matric exemption is required for entry to university.
sentences.cn: 上大学需要有中学毕业的资格证书。
